biography: S. K. Sharma was an Indian cricket umpire. He stood in ten ODI games from 1993 to 2002.
aiSummary: S. K. Sharma is a tuberculosis specialist with an H-index of 114 at AIIMS (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet, Nature Medicine. Based in India.
